notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: P.F.C.V. designed the study, provided funding and coordinated study group selection as well as clinical data assessment and preparation. R.S.S.A. provided medical assistance and coordinated the clinical data assessment. E.O., M.S.F., A.C.C.A., M.F.C.S., L.C.M. and J.O.C. performed experiments. J.G.C.R., L.R.V.A., A.T.-C. and O.A.M.F. carried out data analysis and statistics. J.G.C.R., L.R.V.A. and O.A.M.F. prepared figures and the first draft of the manuscript. P.F.C.V. proofread the final version of manuscript. All authors revised and agreed with the final version of the manuscript.
